column1: 1948 Oct 7th Gauge inspected. Condition fair, site satisfactory. Old gauge nearby in need of repair - readings sometimes taken from there - removal advised
There is no indication as to what data mind have come from the old gauge - there are no obvious duplications
1950 Oct 4th Gauge inspected and satisfactory but pin-hole leak in funnel to be repaired
1950 Gauge not moved, but address corrected to Salterton Road from Waterworks Road
